## Prices


| Ticket                            | Price                |
|-----------------------------------|----------------------|
| ~~Conference day (early bird price)~~ | ~~500 DKK (~70 euros)~~  |
| Conference day (regular price)    | 750 DKK (~100 euros) |
| ~~Workshop (early bird price)~~       | ~~350 DKK (~50 euros)~~  |
| Workshop (regular price)          | 500 DKK (~70 euros)  |

The regular tickets are on sale until February 3, 2020, or until sold out. The early bird tickets were on sale until January 6, 2020. 

We offer a very limited number of free tickets in exchange for practical help on February 28 and 29. If you are interested in this option, contact us at helper@celebration2020.org and write a few sentences about yourself.  

## Register

Register <a href = "https://eventsignup.ku.dk/celebration2020/registration.html" target="_blank">here</a>. You may need to disable pop-up blockers in your browser.

If you have questions about registration, contact us at registration@celebration2020.org.
